sentences.sentence: I think you'll always be more attracted by glister than by gold.
sentences.translation: 我想你将热忠于灿烂华丽更胜于金钱。

sentences.sentence: Xylitol natural ingredients, to the comprehensive protection of the teeth, moth Glister.
sentences.translation: 天然木糖醇成分，能全面保护牙齿，防蛀健齿。

sentences.sentence: GLISTER mouth Refresher Spray - refreshing mint and anise flavour that will leave your mouth always fresh.
sentences.translation: 健齿口腔喷雾—含薄荷及茴香清香，令口气保持清新。
